description: When we are changing columns in table then we should change also columns in shadow table. Otherwise we will be unable to archive rows in these tables.
title: 175 and 176 migrations don't change columns for shadow tables

comments.content: When we are changing columns in table then we should change also columns in shadow table. Otherwise we will be unable to archive rows in these tables.

commit 6eec18975dec823eec513f451492f1befb2e60d0
Author: Boris Pavlovic <email address hidden>
Date:   Mon May 13 14:46:50 2013 +0400

    Sync shadow table for 175 and 176 migration
    
    To be able to use db archiving our table and shadow table should
    have the same columns.
    
    fixes bug 1176443
